description: The Japanese Painted Fern is a stunning foliage plant that is sure to draw attention to any space. Its beautiful silvery-green fronds are filled with delicate white veins that stand out in dramatic contrast. Its fronds also feature shades of pink and burgundy, adding a subtle hint of color. With its vivid colors, intricate patterning and elegant frond shape, this fern is sure to be a stand-out statement in any garden or terrarium. It's a great choice for both expert and beginner gardeners alike.
